TCName.name: SalesHistoryFirstWeek
TCName.SalesHistoryTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryFirsthWeek
TCName.PaidHoursHistoryTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PaidHoursHistoryFourthWeek

TCName.name: CPHHistoryFirsthWeek
TCName.CPHHistoryTotal: select V.div_no,case when V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU = 0 and V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 else ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU),2) end as ACTL_CPH_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_MPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no

TCName.name: CPHHistorySecondWeek

TCName.name: WagePercentageHistoryFirsthWeek
TCName.WagePercentageHistoryTotal: select actl_wge.div_no,case when actl_wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU = 0 and actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when actl_wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge.ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU / actl_sls.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) end as ACTL_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_MPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_MPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),0) as ACTL_HRS_MPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_wge, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_sls where actl_wge.div_no=actl_sls.div_no order by actl_wge.div_no

TCName.name: ItemPriceHistoryFirsthWeek
TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select x.div_no,case when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU = 0 and x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TCName.ItemPriceHistoryTotal: select x.div_no,case when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU = 0 and x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 when x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU =0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TCName.name: ORHistoryFirstWeek
TCName.ORHistoryTotal: select actl_sms.div_no, case when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU)*100,0),0) end as ACTL_OR_TOT_WTSBU from (select lc.div_no,NVL(sum(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSG),0) as ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select div_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when --task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) --When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when --task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case --when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between --(select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When --LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When --LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by div_no order by div_no) xy on lc.div_no=xy.div_no group by lc.div_no order by lc.div_no)actl_sms, (select lc.div_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.div_no order by e.div_no) hrs on hrs.div_no=lc.div_no order by lc.div_no)actl_hrs where actl_hrs.div_no=actl_sms.div_no order by actl_sms.div_no

b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.div_no order by e.div_no) hrs on hrs.div_no=lc.div_no order by lc.div_no)actl_hrs where actl_hrs.div_no=actl_sms.div_no order by actl_sms.div_no

TCName.name: ORHistoryFourthWeek
TCName.ORHistoryTotal: select actl_sms.div_no, case when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((actl_sms.ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU / actl_hrs.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU)*100,0),0) end as ACTL_OR_TOT_WTSBU from (select lc.div_no,NVL(sum(xy.ACTL_SMS_DTSG),0) as ACTL_SMS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select div_no,Sum(ACTL_SMS_DTSG) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select distinct src.*, (CASE when --task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) --When task_nm='Major Fill' Then ((((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000)) * src.fix_hrs_pct)/100) + src.fix_hrs) when --task_nm<>'Major Fill' and dept_no not in (5,10,15) Then ((((src.var_per_mtrc_type_cd * NVL(src.itm_cnt,0))/1000))+src.fix_hrs) END) as ACTL_SMS_DTSG from (select LL.task_no,LL.task_nm,ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm,LL.wk_id,LL.day_of_wk,LL.FIX_HRS,LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS,LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte, (case --when LL.task_nm = 'Major Fill' then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte between --(select wk_strt from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') and (select wk_end from wk where fin_yr='Year' and fin_wk_no='FinWk') ) When --LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no in (5,10,15) then (select sum(actl_itm_cnt) from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no in (5,10,15) and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) When --LL.task_nm <> 'Major Fill' and LL.dept_no not in (5,10,15) then (select actl_itm_cnt from dly_sls where loc_no=LL.loc_no and dept_no=LL.dept_no and txn_dte = LL.txn_dte) end ) as itm_cnt from (select Y.task_no,Y.task_nm,y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.dept_no,Y.dept_nm,Y.wk_id,Y.day_of_wk,Y.FIX_HRS,Y.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,Y.VOL_HRS,Y.FIX_HRS_PCT , ds.actl_itm_cnt,ds.txn_dte as txn_dte from (select distinct A.task_no,tk.task_nm,lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no, dt.dept_nm,A.wk_id,A.day_of_wk,dy.day_dte,A.FIX_HRS,A.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD,A.VOL_HRS,sg.FIX_HRS_PCT , w.wk_strt , w.wk_end ,tk.dept_no, decode(A.day_of_wk,0,w.wk_strt,1,w.wk_strt+1,2,w.wk_strt+2,3,w.wk_strt+3,4,w.wk_strt+4,5,w.wk_strt+5,6,w.WK_END) as X from ww_Wlp.lbr_Std A inner join ww_wlp.wk w on A.wk_id=w.wk_id inner join ww_wlp.task tk on A.task_No=tk.task_No inner join ww_wlp.loc lc on lc.loc_no=a.loc_no and lc.div_no='Division' left outer join ww_Wlp.fix_hrs_wky_sprd_gbl sg on A.loc_No=sg.loc_no and A.task_No=sg.task_no and A.day_of_Wk=sg.day_of_wk inner join dept dt on dt.dept_no=tk.dept_no inner join loc_dept ld on dt.dept_no=ld.dept_no and lc.loc_no=ld.loc_no and dt.div_no ='Division' inner join day dy on a.day_of_wk=dy.day_of_wk and dy.wk_id=w.wk_id and dy.day_dte between w.wk_strt and sysdate-1 where w.fin_yr='Year' and w.fin_wk_no='FinWk' and A.loc_no IN (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' ) order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,A.loc_no,A.task_no,tk.dept_no,dt.dept_nm,a.day_of_wk) Y inner join ww_wlp.dly_sls ds on Y.loc_No=ds.loc_no and Y.dept_no=ds.dept_no and ds.txn_dte = X order by y.div_no,y.rgn_no,y.zone_no,y.ar_no,Y.loc_no,Y.task_no,Y.dept_no, y.X) LL group by LL.task_nm, LL.task_no, ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no, LL.dept_no,LL.dept_nm, LL.wk_id, LL.day_of_wk, LL.FIX_HRS, LL.VAR_PER_MTRC_TYPE_CD, LL.VOL_HRS, LL.FIX_HRS_PCT , LL.txn_dte order by ll.div_no,ll.rgn_no,ll.zone_no,ll.ar_no,LL.loc_no,ll.day_of_wk) src where dept_no not in (20) order by src.loc_no,src.dept_no,src.task_no) sms_src group by div_no order by div_no) xy on lc.div_no=xy.div_no group by lc.div_no order by lc.div_no)actl_sms, (select lc.div_no,NVL(hrs.ACTL_HRS_DTS,0) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,sum(e.actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WGE_DTS,sum(e.actl_hrs) as ACTL_HRS_DTS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,a.wk_id, nvl(a.actl_wage_amt,0) as actl_wage_amt,nvl(a.actl_hrs,0) as actl_hrs from ww_wlp.actl_wky_wage a, loc b, wk c , dept d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and a.wk_id=c.wk_id and c.wk_id='Week' and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id) e group by e.div_no order by e.div_no) hrs on hrs.div_no=lc.div_no order by lc.div_no)actl_hrs where actl_hrs.div_no=actl_sms.div_no order by actl_sms.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPBU),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_MPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no
TCName.ForecastSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FRCST_SLS_MPBU),0) as FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_SALES_MPBU,0) as FRCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.FRCST_SLS),0) as fcst_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPBU),0) as GEN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.PLN_SALES_WPBU,0) as GEN_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_WPS),0) as PLN_SALES_WPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,sum(a.SALES) as PLN_SLS_WPS from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: GeneratedSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.GeneratedSalesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPBU),0) as GEN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.GEN_SALES_MPBU,0) as GEN_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS),0) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,(sum(a.gnrt_sls)) as GEN_SLS_MPS from fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: VarToBUDSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.VartoBUDTotal: select pln_sls.div_no,(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU - bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU) as VAR_TO_BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_SALES_MPBU),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_MPS),0) as PLN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,sum(a.sales) as PLN_SLS_MPS from pln_fcst_cmb_vw a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls, (select d.div_no,sum(d.BDGT_SLS_MPBU) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_MPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.div_no=bdgt_sls.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no
TCName.VartoFCSTTotal: select pln_sls.div_no,ROUND((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU - FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU)) as VAR_TO_FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_SALES_MPBU),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.PLN_SLS_MPS),0) as PLN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,sum(a.sales) as PLN_SLS_MPS from pln_fcst_cmb_vw a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls, (select d.div_no,sum(d.FRCST_SLS_MPBU) as FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_SALES_MPBU,0) as FRCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.FRCST_SLS),0) as fcst_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) FRCST_SLS where pln_sls.div_no=FRCST_SLS.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no

TCName.name: PercentageLYsales_CurrentMonth
TCName.PercentLYSalesTotal: select pln_sls_cy.div_no, case when pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPBU=0 and actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPBU=0 then -100 when actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls_cy.PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPBU / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_TOT_SLS_MPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_SLS_MPBU),0) as PLN_SLS_CY_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_SLS),0) as PLN_SLS_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_SLS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear') d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.GEN_SLS_MPS),0) as GEN_SALES_MPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.SALES),0) as GEN_SLS_MPS from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear') group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_sls_cy, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_sls_ly where pln_sls_cy.div_no=actl_sls_ly.div_no order by pln_sls_cy.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetPercentageSales_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetPercentageTotal: select pln_sls.div_no, case when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 and bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then -100 when bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU / bdgt_sls.BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPBU)-1)*100,2) end as BDGT_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select lc.div_no,NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU,0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.div_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_WPS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) f UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) g) h group by h.div_no order by h.div_no) sls on lc.div_no=sls.div_no) pln_sls, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_SLS_WPBU),0) as BDGT_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_SALES_WPBU,0) as BDGT_SLS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.bdgt_sls),0) as BDGT_SALES_WPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) bdgt_sls where pln_sls.div_no=bdgt_sls.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no
TCName.ForecastPercentageTotal: select pln_sls.div_no, case when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 and FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then -100 when FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU / FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_WPBU)-1)*100,2) end as fcst_PRCNT_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select lc.div_no,NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU,0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.div_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_WPS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) f UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) g) h group by h.div_no order by h.div_no) sls on lc.div_no=sls.div_no) pln_sls, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FRCST_SLS_WPBU),0) as FRCST_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_SALES_WPBU,0) as FRCST_SLS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.FRCST_SLS),0) as fcst_SALES_WPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) FRCST_SLS where pln_sls.div_no=FRCST_SLS.div_no order by pln_sls.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetWagesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.BDGT_WGE_MPBU),0) as BDGT_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.BDGT_WAGE_MPBU,0) as BDGT_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.bdgt_wage_amt),0) as BDGT_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no
TCName.ForecastWagesTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.fcst_WGE_MPBU),0) as fcst_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_WAGE_MPBU,0) as fcst_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.frcst_wage_amt),0) as fcst_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedWagesTotal: select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_TOT_WPBU),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedLYWages_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedLYWagesTotal: Select pln_wge_cy.div_no, case when pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 and actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 then -100 when actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_wge_cy.PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_WPBU / actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU)-1)*100,2) end as LY_PRCNT_WAGE_TOT_WPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_WPBU),0) as PLN_WAGE_CY_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as PLN_WGE_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge_cy, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_WPBU),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),0) as ACTL_HRS_WPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_wge_ly where pln_wge_cy.div_no=actl_wge_ly.div_no order by pln_wge_cy.div_no

TCName.name: BudgetWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth

TCName.ForecastWagesPercentageTotal: select fcst_wge.div_no, case when fcst_wge.fcst_WGE_TOT_MPBU=0 and FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when fcst_wge.fcst_WGE_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((fcst_wge.fcst_WGE_TOT_MPBU / FRCST_SLS.FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) end as fcst_WGE_PRCNT_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.fcst_WGE_MPBU),0) as fcst_WGE_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_WAGE_MPBU,0) as fcst_WGE_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.frcst_wage_amt),0) as fcst_WAGE_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) fcst_wge, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.FRCST_SLS_MPBU),0) as FRCST_SLS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.fcst_SALES_MPBU,0) as FRCST_SLS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.FRCST_SLS),0) as fcst_SALES_MPBU from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, wk b, loc c where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) FRCST_SLS where fcst_wge.div_no=FRCST_SLS.div_no order by fcst_wge.div_no
