d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge, (select lc.div_no,NVL(sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU,0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.div_no,sum(h.PLN_SLS_WPS) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WPBU from (select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt) as PLN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) f UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no,ROUND(sum(e.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_WPS,sum(e.gnrt_itm) as GEN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.loc_no,e.dept_no) g) h group by h.div_no order by h.div_no) sls on lc.div_no=sls.div_no) pln_sls where pln_wge.div_no=pln_sls.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no

TCName.name: LYWagesPercentage_CurrentMonth
TCName.LYWagesPercentageTotal: select actl_wge_ly.div_no, case when actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 and actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((actl_wge_ly.ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU / actl_sls_ly.ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_WPBU)*100,2) end as LY_WAGE_PRCNT_TOT_WPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_WPBU),0) as ACTL_WAGE_LY_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,sum(actl_wage_amt) as ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),0) as ACTL_HRS_WPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_wge_ly, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_WPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_LY_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_WPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_WPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_sls_ly where actl_wge_ly.div_no=actl_sls_ly.div_no order by actl_wge_ly.div_no

TCName.name: SMSHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.SMSHoursTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.SMS_HRS_MPBU),2) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(ROUND(((ROUND((sum(U.SMS_HOURS_MPBU*100)/25),0)*25)/100),2),0) as SMS_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))),2) as SMS_HOURS_MPBU from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no group by T.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedHours_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedHoursTotal: select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no

TCName.name: HoursLY_CurrentMonth
TCName.HoursLYTotal: select pln_hrs_cy.div_no, case when pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 and actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 then -100 when actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_hrs_cy.PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_WPBU / actl_hrs_ly.ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_WPBU)-1)*100,0) end as LY_PRCNT_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_CY_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs_cy, (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_WPBU),2) as ACTL_HRS_LY_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_WPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_WPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) actl_hrs_ly where pln_hrs_cy.div_no=actl_hrs_ly.div_no order by pln_hrs_cy.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedOR_CurrentMonth
TCName.plannedORTotal: select sms_hrs.div_no, case when sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 and pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_WPBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU)*100,2) end as PLN_OR_TOT_WPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.SMS_HRS_WPBU),2) as SMS_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.SMS_HOURS_WPBU,0) as SMS_HRS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))),2) as SMS_HOURS_WPBU from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) sms_hrs LEFT OUTER JOIN (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs ON sms_hrs.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by sms_hrs.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedCPHTotal: select pln_wge.div_no, case when pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU=0 and pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU),2) end as PLN_CPH_TOT_WPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_WPBU),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE),0) as PLN_WGE_WPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear') d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION*/ select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as PLN_WGE_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear')*/ order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge, (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (/*select * from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear') d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) UNION*/ select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no NOT IN (select a.loc_no from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear')*/ order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no)) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no

TCName.name: GrowthLYCPH_CurrentMonth
TCName.GrowthLYCPHTotal: select pln_cph_cy.div_no, case when pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 and actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_WPBU=0 then -100 when actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_cph_cy.PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_WPBU / actl_cph_ly.ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_WPBU)-1)*100,2) end as GROWTH_LY_CPH_TOT_WPBU from (select pln_wge.div_no, case when pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU=0 and pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU),2) end as PLN_CPH_CY_TOT_WPBU from (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_WGE_WPBU),0) as PLN_WAGE_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_wage_dept),0) as PLN_WGE_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.wge+d.wge_adj) as base_wage_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0) as wge,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0) as wge_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_wge, (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs where pln_wge.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by pln_wge.div_no) pln_cph_cy, (select V.div_no, case when V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_WPBU=0 and V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((V.ACTL_WGE_TOT_WPBU / V.ACTL_HRS_TOT_WPBU),2) end as ACTL_CPH_LY_TOT_WPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_WGE_WPBU),0) as ACTL_WGE_TOT_WPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_HRS_WPBU),9) as ACTL_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,0) as ACTL_WGE_WPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_HOURS_WPBU,0) as ACTL_HRS_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(actl_wage_amt),0) as ACTL_WAGE_WPBU,ROUND(sum(actl_hrs),2) as ACTL_HOURS_WPBU from WW_WLP.ACTL_WKY_WAGE a,loc b, wk d where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and d.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and d.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and a.dept_no!=20 group by b.div_no,b.rgn_no order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) V order by V.div_no) actl_cph_ly where pln_cph_cy.div_no=actl_cph_ly.div_no order by pln_cph_cy.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedItemPrice_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedItemPriceTotal: select x.div_no, case when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU=0 and x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),2) end as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.ITEMS),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a, wk b, loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedItems_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedItemsTotal: select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.PLN_ITM_MPBU),0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.PLN_ITEMS_WPBU,0) as PLN_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.PLN_ITM_WPS),0) as PLN_ITEMS_WPBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no,sum(a.ITEMS) as PLN_ITM_WPS from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a, wk b, loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no=a.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.proc_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.loc_no) d group by d.div_no,d.rgn_no order by d.div_no,d.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedIPLHitems_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedIPLHitemsTotal: select PLN_HRS.div_no, case when ITM.PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU=0 and PLN_HRS.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when ITM.PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 when PLN_HRS.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((ITM.PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU / PLN_HRS.PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU),0) end as PLN_ITM_IPLH from (select lc.div_no,NVL(sls.PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU,0) as PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct b.div_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division' order by b.div_no) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select h.div_no,sum(h.PLN_ITM_WPS) as PLN_ITM_TOT_WPBU from (select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS,ROUND(sum(e.mgr_pln_itm_cnt),0) as PLN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.mgr_pln_sls,0) as mgr_pln_sls,nvl(a.mgr_pln_itm_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_itm_cnt,nvl(a.mgr_pln_cust_cnt,0) as mgr_pln_cust_cnt from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.mgr_pln_sls_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) f UNION select * from (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_WPS,ROUND(sum(e.gnrt_itm),0) as GEN_ITM_WPS from (select b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dept_nm,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk, nvl(a.gnrt_sls,0) as gnrt_sls,nvl(a.gnrt_itm,0) as gnrt_itm,nvl(a.gnrt_cust,0) as gnrt_cust from ww_wlp.fcst a, loc b, wk c , dept d, day dy where a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.fcst_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte from mgr_dly_pln a, loc b, wk c where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between c.wk_strt and c.wk_end and c.FIN_WK_NO in ('FinWeek') AND c.FIN_YR IN ('FinYear') and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no=b.div_no and b.div_no='Division' ) and a.fcst_dte=dy.day_dte and c.wk_id=dy.wk_id order by b.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,d.dply_seq,c.perd_desc,c.wk_id,a.fcst_dte,dy.day_of_wk) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) g) h group by h.div_no order by h.div_no) sls on lc.div_no=sls.div_no) itm LEFT OUTER JOIN (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_WPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.base_hours_dept),0) as PLN_HOURS_WPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,(d.hrs+d.hrs_adj) as base_hours_dept from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(TA_PLN_HRS,0) as hrs,nvl(WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0) as hrs_adj from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) PLN_HRS on ITM.div_no=PLN_HRS.div_no

TCName.name: PlannedPercentOnLY_CurrentMonth
TCName.PlannedpercentonLYTotal: select pln_itm_prz_cy.div_no, case when pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPG=0 and actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR=0 then 0 when pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPG=0 then -100 when actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR=0 then 0 else ROUND(((pln_itm_prz_cy.PLN_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPG / actl_itm_prz_ly.ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR)-1)*100,2) end as PLN_PRCNT_LY_ITM_PRZ_TOT_WPS from (select x.div_no,ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),9) as PLN_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPG from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.SALES),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.ITEMS),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from WW_WLP.PLN_FCST_CMB_VW a, wk b, loc c where a.PROC_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no) pln_itm_prz_cy, (select x.div_no,ROUND((x.ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU / x.ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU),9) as ACTL_ITM_PRZ_TOT_MPR from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_SLS_MPBU),0) as ACTL_SLS_TOT_MPBU,ROUND(sum(d.ACTL_ITM_MPBU),0) as ACTL_ITM_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.ACTL_SALES_MPBU,0) as ACTL_SLS_MPBU,NVL(U.ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU,0) as ACTL_ITM_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(a.actl_sls),0) as ACTL_SALES_MPBU,ROUND(sum(a.actl_itm_cnt),0) as ACTL_ITEMS_MPBU from ww_wlp.dly_sls a, wk b, loc c where a.TXN_DTE between b.WK_STRT and b.WK_END and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='LYFinYr' and dept_no NOT IN (0,90,20) and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) x order by x.div_no) actl_itm_prz_ly where pln_itm_prz_cy.div_no=actl_itm_prz_ly.div_no

TCName.name: BGDT_FCST_OR_CurrentMonth
TCName.BudgetORTotal: select src.div_no, case when (select datavalue from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR where updtime in (select max(updtime) from ADT_TRL_TOGGLE_BDGT_HOUR_OR)) in ('Hide Budget Hour and OR%','Show Budget Hour Hide Budget OR%') then 0 else src.BDGT_OR_TOT_WPWG end as BDGT_OR_TOT_WPWG from (select x.div_no, case when NVL(x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPWG,0)=0 and NVL(x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPWG,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPWG,0)=0 then 0 else NVL(ROUND((x.BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPWG / x.BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPWG) * 100,2),0) end as BDGT_OR_TOT_WPWG from (select f.div_no,sum(g.BDGT_SMS_WPR) as BDGT_SMS_TOT_WPWG,sum(g.BDGT_HRS_WPR) as BDGT_HRS_TOT_WPWG from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.div_no,C.rgn_no,sum(bdgt_sms_hrs) as BDGT_SMS_WPR,sum(bdgt_hrs) as BDGT_HRS_WPR from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id,nvl(bdgt_sms_hrs,0) as bdgt_sms_hrs, nvl(bdgt_hrs,0) as bdgt_hrs from WW_WLP.wky_bdgt a,loc b, wk d where a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where fin_wk_no in ('FinWeek') and fin_yr in ('FinYear')) and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and b.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=d.wk_id and a.dept_no NOT IN (20) order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,d.perd_desc,a.wk_id) C group by C.div_no,C.rgn_no order by C.div_no,C.rgn_no) g on f.div_no=g.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) x order by x.div_no) src order by src.div_no
TCName.ForecastORTotal: select sms_hrs.div_no, case when sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU=0 and pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 when pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU)*100,2) end as PLN_OR_TOT_MPBU from (select d.div_no,ROUND(sum(d.SMS_HRS_MPBU),0) as SMS_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select T.div_no,NVL(U.SMS_HOURS_MPBU,0) as SMS_HRS_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from ww_wlp.loc where div_no='Division' order by div_no,rgn_no) T LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(nvl(a.vol_hrs,0)) + sum(nvl(a.fix_hrs,0))),2) as SMS_HOURS_MPBU from ww_wlp.lbr_std a, wk b, loc c, task d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and dept_no NOT IN (20) and a.task_no=d.task_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.div_no='Division' group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no) U on T.div_no=U.div_no order by T.div_no) d group by d.div_no order by d.div_no) sms_hrs LEFT OUTER JOIN (select f.div_no,NVL(sum(e.PLN_HOURS_MPBU),0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_MPBU from (select distinct div_no from loc where div_no='Division' order by rgn_no) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(e.plan_paid_hours),0) as PLN_HOURS_MPBU from (select d.div_no,d.rgn_no,d.zone_no,d.ar_no,d.loc_no,d.dept_no,d.plan_paid_hours from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no,nvl(plan_paid_hours,0) as plan_paid_hours from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no=c.div_no and c.div_no='Division' and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='FinYear' and DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) order by c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,a.dept_no) d) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no) e on e.div_no=f.div_no group by f.div_no order by f.div_no) pln_hrs ON sms_hrs.div_no=pln_hrs.div_no order by sms_hrs.div_no

TCName.name: MonthlyViewMetricsValidation
TCName.Sales: select f.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSBU from (select distinct wk_id,fin_wk_no from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month' order by wk_id) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id
TCName.SalesTotal: select 'Total' as Tot,NVL(ROUND(sum(e.PLAN_SALES),0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc,c.wk_id from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on lc.wk_id=e.wk_id group by lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc
TCName.Wages: select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE),0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id
TCName.WagesTotal: select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c/* , loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc
TCName.WagePercentage: select pln_wge.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WTSBU)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PCT_WTSBU from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_wge, (select f.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLAN_SALES,0) as PLN_SLS_WTSBU from (select distinct wk_id,fin_wk_no from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month' order by wk_id) f LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.wk_id,a.loc_no,Round(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.wk_id,a.loc_no order by b.wk_id,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on f.wk_id=e.wk_id order by f.wk_id) pln_sls where pln_wge.fin_wk_no=pln_sls.fin_wk_no order by pln_wge.fin_wk_no
TCName.WagePercentageTotal: select 'Total' as Tot, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU / pln_sls.PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSBU)*100,2) end as PLN_WGE_PCT_TOT_WTSBU from (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc) pln_wge, (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(ROUND(e.PLAN_SALES,0),0) as PLN_SLS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLAN_SALES) as PLAN_SALES from (select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_wky_sls),0) as PLAN_SALES from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) c UNION select * from (select b.perd_desc,a.loc_no,ROUND(sum(gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SALES from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b where a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.dept_no NOT IN (0,20,90) and a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.perd_desc='Month' and (a.loc_no,b.wk_id) NOT IN (select loc_no,wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln where div_no='Division' and loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and wk_id in (select wk_id from ww_wlp.wk where perd_desc='Month')) group by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no order by b.perd_desc,a.loc_no) d) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on lc.perd_desc=e.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc) pln_sls where pln_wge.perd_desc=pln_sls.perd_desc order by pln_wge.perd_desc
TCName.CPHValue: select pln_wge.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_WTSBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU),2) end as PLN_CPH_WTSBU from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_wge, (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_WTSBU,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_HOURS_WTSBU) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) ,0) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_hrs where pln_wge.fin_wk_no=pln_hrs.fin_wk_no order by pln_wge.fin_wk_no
TCName.CPHTotal: select 'Total' as Tot, case when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((pln_wge.PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSBU),2) end as PLN_CPH_TOT_WTSBU from (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_WAGE_WTSBU,0) as PLN_WGE_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_WAGE_MPS) as PLN_WAGE_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_WGE) ,0) as PLN_WAGE_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_WGE from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_AMT)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,WAGE_ADJ_AMT from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc) pln_wge, (select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_WTSBU,0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_HOURS_WTSBU) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) ,0) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from TCName.PlanPaidHours: select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_HRS_MPS) as PLN_HRS_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HRS_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_COST_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id
TCName.PlanPaidHoursTotal: select lc.perd_desc,NVL(e.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0) as PLN_HRS_TOT_WTSBU from (select distinct c.perd_desc from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.perd_desc) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.perd_desc,sum(PLN_HRS_MPS) as PLN_HRS_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS) ,0) as PLN_HRS_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),0) as BASE_HRS_MPS from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c/* , loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no order by d.perd_desc,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.perd_desc order by z.perd_desc) e on e.perd_desc=lc.perd_desc order by lc.perd_desc
TCName.ORPercentage: select sms_hrs.fin_wk_no, case when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 and NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 when NVL(pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((sms_hrs.SMS_HRS_WTSBU / pln_hrs.PLN_HRS_WTSBU)*100,1) end as PLN_OR_WTSBU from (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(y.SMS_HOURS_WTSBU,0) as SMS_HRS_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select C.wk_id,sum(C.SMS_HOURS_WTSBU) as SMS_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,B.PERD_DESC,a.wk_id,d.dept_no, a.task_no,nvl(a.fix_hrs,0) as fix_hrs,NVL(a.vol_hrs,0) as vol_hrs from ww_wlp.wky_lbr_std a, ww_wlp.wk b, (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and ld.dept_no=d.dept_no*/ ) A group by a.wk_id,a.rgn_no order by a.wk_id,a.rgn_no) C group by C.wk_id order by c.wk_id) y on lc.wk_id=y.wk_id order by lc.wk_id)sms_hrs, (select lc.fin_wk_no,NVL(e.PLN_HOURS_WTSBU,0) as PLN_HRS_WTSBU from (select distinct c.wk_id,c.fin_wk_no from wk c where c.perd_desc='Month' order by c.wk_id) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select z.wk_id,sum(PLN_HOURS_WTSBU) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND(sum(d.MGR_WKY_HRS),0) as PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) d group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no) UNION select * from (select d.wk_id,d.rgn_no,ROUND((sum(d.TA_PLN_HRS) + sum(d.WAGE_ADJ_HRS)),9) as BASE_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,a.dept_no,TA_PLN_HRS,WAGE_ADJ_HRS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c /*, loc_dept ld */ where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month') and a.DEPT_NO NOT IN (20) /*and a.loc_no=ld.loc_no and a.dept_no=ld.dept_no*/) d where (d.loc_no,d.wk_id) NOT IN (select a.loc_no,a.wk_id from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and c.loc_no in (select b.loc_no from loc b where b.div_no='Division') and a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.perd_desc in ('Month')) group by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no order by d.wk_id,d.rgn_no)) z group by z.wk_id order by z.wk_id) e on e.wk_id=lc.wk_id order by lc.wk_id) pln_hrs where sms_hrs.fin_wk_no=pln_hrs.fin_wk_no order by sms_hrs.fin_wk_no

PLN_HOURS_WTSBU from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,b.perd_desc,a.wk_id,MGR_WKY_HRS from ww_wlp.mgr_wky_pln a, ww_wlp.wk b, ww_wlp.loc c where a.loc_no=c.loc_no and TCName.name: PlannedBudgetAndForecastRate
TCName.PlannedBudgetRate:
select rslt.div_no,sum(OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_WPS) as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_WPWG from (select src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.dept_nm, case when src.PLN_SLS_WPS > src.BDGT_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.PST_FACTOR_WPS * src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.BDGT_SLS_WPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_WPS))),0),0) When src.PLN_SLS_WPS < src.BDGT_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.NGT_FACTOR_WPS * src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.BDGT_SLS_WPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_WPS))),0),0) else NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - src.BDGT_WGE_WPS),0),0) end as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_WPS from (select a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.dply_seq,a.dept_nm, a.PLN_WGE_WPS,b.PST_FACTOR_WPS,b.NGT_FACTOR_WPS,c.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS,d.PLN_SLS_WPS,c.BDGT_WGE_WPS,C.BDGT_SLS_WPS from
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(pln_wge.pln_wge_wps,0) as PLN_WGE_WPS,NVL(pln_wge.pln_hrs_wps,0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, b.wk_id, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0))),0) as PLN_WGE_WPS, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_HRS,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0))),0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq,b.wk_id) pln_wge on lc.div_no=pln_wge.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_wge.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_wge.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_wge.ar_no and lc.loc_no=pln_wge.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_wge.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=pln_wge.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=pln_wge.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=pln_wge.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) a,
(select src.rgn_no,src.pst_factor_wps,src.ngt_factor_wps from (select * from (select lc.wk_id,'1' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99,1) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r1 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'2' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99,2) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r2 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'3' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99,3) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r3 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'4' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99,4) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r4 UNION ALL select * from (select lc.wk_id,'5' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select perd_desc,wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select * from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where (wk_id,rgn_no) in (select wk_id,max(rgn_no) as rgn_no from WAGE_FCTR_CNFG where wk_id in (select wk_id from wk where wk_id='Week') and rgn_no in (99,5) group by wk_id) order by wk_id,rgn_no) src on lc.wk_id=src.wk_id order by lc.wk_id,src.rgn_no) r5 UNION ALL select * from (select distinct c.wk_id, '90' as rgn_no,0.5 as pst_factor_wps,1 as ngt_factor_wps from wk c where /*b.rgn_no in (5) and*/ c.wk_id in (Week)) r90) src order by src.rgn_no) b,
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.bdgt_wge_wps,0) as BDGT_WGE_WPS,NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.bdgt_sls_wps,0) as BDGT_SLS_WPS,NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS,0) as BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, NVL(ROUND(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_WPS, NVL(ROUND(a.bdgt_sls,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_WPS, case when nvl(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0)=0 and nvl(a.bdgt_sls,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.bdgt_sls,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((a.bdgt_wage_amt / a.bdgt_sls)*100,2) end as BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) bdgt_wge_pct on lc.div_no=bdgt_wge_pct.div_no and lc.rgn_no=bdgt_wge_pct.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no and lc.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no and lc.loc_no=bdgt_wge_pct.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=bdgt_wge_pct.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=bdgt_wge_pct.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=bdgt_wge_pct.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=bdgt_wge_pct.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) c,
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(pln_sls.PLN_SLS_WPS,0) as PLN_SLS_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dept_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm,sum(e.PLN_SLS_WPS) as PLN_SLS_WPS from (select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) c UNION select * from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,ROUND(sum(a.gnrt_sls),0) as GEN_SLS_WPS from ww_wlp.fcst a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.fcst_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select loc_no,dept_no,mgr_pln_sls_dte from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,mgr_pln_sls_dte,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS from ww_wlp.mgr_dly_pln a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.mgr_pln_sls_dte between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte)) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) d ) e group by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_no,e.loc_nm,e.dept_no,e.dply_seq,e.dept_nm order by e.div_no,e.rgn_no,e.zone_no,e.ar_no,e.loc_nm,e.dply_seq) pln_sls on lc.div_no=pln_sls.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_sls.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_sls.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_sls.ar_no and lc.loc_no=pln_sls.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_sls.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=pln_sls.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=pln_sls.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=pln_sls.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) d
where a.div_no=c.div_no and a.div_no=d.div_no and c.div_no=d.div_no and a.rgn_no=c.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and c.rgn_no=d.rgn_no and a.rgn_no=b.rgn_no and a.zone_no=c.zone_no and a.zone_no=d.zone_no and c.zone_no=d.zone_no and a.ar_no=c.ar_no and a.ar_no=d.ar_no and c.ar_no=d.ar_no and a.loc_nm=c.loc_nm and a.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and c.loc_nm=d.loc_nm and a.dept_nm=c.dept_nm and a.dept_nm=d.dept_nm and c.dept_nm=d.dept_nm order by a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.dply_seq) src) rslt group by rslt.div_no order by rslt.div_no
TCName.PlannedBudgetRateTotal:
select rslt.div_no,sum(OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_WPS) as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_TOT_WPWG from (select src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.dept_nm, case when src.PLN_SLS_WPS > src.BDGT_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.PST_FACTOR_WPS * src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.BDGT_SLS_WPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_WPS))),0),0) When src.PLN_SLS_WPS < src.BDGT_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.NGT_FACTOR_WPS * src.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.BDGT_SLS_WPS)) + src.BDGT_WGE_WPS))),0),0) else NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - src.BDGT_WGE_WPS),0),0) end as OVERSPENT_BDGT_RATE_WPS from (select a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.dply_seq,a.dept_nm, a.PLN_WGE_WPS,b.PST_FACTOR_WPS,b.NGT_FACTOR_WPS,c.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS,d.PLN_SLS_WPS,c.BDGT_WGE_WPS,C.BDGT_SLS_WPS from
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(pln_wge.pln_wge_wps,0) as PLN_WGE_WPS,NVL(pln_wge.pln_hrs_wps,0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, b.wk_id, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0))),0) as PLN_WGE_WPS, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_HRS,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0))),0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq,b.wk_id) pln_wge on lc.div_no=pln_wge.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_wge.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_wge.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_wge.ar_no and lc.loc_no=pln_wge.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_wge.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=pln_wge.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=pln_wge.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=pln_wge.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) a,
(select src.rgn_no,src.pst_factor_wps,src.ngt_factor_wps from (select * from (select lc.wk_id,'1' as rgn_no,NVL(src.pst_factor,0.5) as pst_factor_wps,NVL(src.ngt_factor,1) as ngt_factor_wps from (select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.bdgt_wge_wps,0) as BDGT_WGE_WPS,NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.bdgt_sls_wps,0) as BDGT_SLS_WPS,NVL(bdgt_wge_pct.BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS,0) as BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, NVL(ROUND(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0),0) as BDGT_WGE_WPS, NVL(ROUND(a.bdgt_sls,0),0) as BDGT_SLS_WPS, case when nvl(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0)=0 and nvl(a.bdgt_sls,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.bdgt_wage_amt,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.bdgt_sls,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((a.bdgt_wage_amt / a.bdgt_sls)*100,2) end as BDGT_WGE_PCT_WPS from ww_wlp.wky_bdgt a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) bdgt_wge_pct on lc.div_no=bdgt_wge_pct.div_no and lc.rgn_no=bdgt_wge_pct.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=bdgt_wge_pct.zone_no and lc.ar_no=bdgt_wge_pct.ar_no and lc.loc_no=bdgt_wge_pct.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=bdgt_wge_pct.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=bdgt_wge_pct.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=bdgt_wge_pct.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=bdgt_wge_pct.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) c,

select rslt.div_no,sum(OVERSPENT_FRCST_RATE_WPS) as OVERSPENT_FRCST_RATE_WPWG from (select src.div_no,src.rgn_no,src.zone_no,src.ar_no,src.loc_nm,src.dept_nm, case when src.PLN_SLS_WPS > src.FRCST_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.PST_FACTOR_WPS * src.FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.FRCST_SLS_WPS)) + src.FRCST_WGE_WPS))),0),0) When src.PLN_SLS_WPS < src.FRCST_SLS_WPS then NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - ((((src.NGT_FACTOR_WPS * src.FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS) * (src.PLN_SLS_WPS - src.FRCST_SLS_WPS)) + src.FRCST_WGE_WPS))),0),0) else NVL(ROUND((src.PLN_WGE_WPS - src.FRCST_WGE_WPS),0),0) end as OVERSPENT_FRCST_RATE_WPS from (select a.div_no,a.rgn_no,a.zone_no,a.ar_no,a.loc_nm,a.dply_seq,a.dept_nm, a.PLN_WGE_WPS,b.PST_FACTOR_WPS,b.NGT_FACTOR_WPS,c.FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS,d.PLN_SLS_WPS,c.FRCST_WGE_WPS,C.FRCST_SLS_WPS from
(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(pln_wge.pln_wge_wps,0) as PLN_WGE_WPS,NVL(pln_wge.pln_hrs_wps,0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, b.wk_id, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_WAGE_AMT,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_AMT,0))),0) as PLN_WGE_WPS, ROUND((sum(nvl(a.TA_PLN_HRS,0)) + sum(nvl(a.WAGE_ADJ_HRS,0))),0) as PLN_HRS_WPS from ww_wlp.wky_dept_pln a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,b.wk_id order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq,b.wk_id) pln_wge on lc.div_no=pln_wge.div_no and lc.rgn_no=pln_wge.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=pln_wge.zone_no and lc.ar_no=pln_wge.ar_no and lc.loc_no=pln_wge.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=pln_wge.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=pln_wge.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=pln_wge.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=pln_wge.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) a,

(select lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dept_no,lc.dply_seq,lc.dept_nm, NVL(FRCST_wge_pct.FRCST_wge_wps,0) as FRCST_WGE_WPS,NVL(FRCST_wge_pct.FRCST_sls_wps,0) as FRCST_SLS_WPS,NVL(FRCST_wge_pct.FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS,0) as FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS from (select a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and b.wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') and a.dept_no not in (20) and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.dept_no=c.dept_no and b.div_no=c.div_no order by a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,b.loc_nm,c.dply_seq) lc LEFT OUTER JOIN (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm, NVL(ROUND(a.FRCST_wage_amt,0),0) as FRCST_WGE_WPS, NVL(ROUND(a.FRCST_sls,0),0) as FRCST_SLS_WPS, case when nvl(a.FRCST_wage_amt,0)=0 and nvl(a.FRCST_sls,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.FRCST_wage_amt,0)=0 then 0 when nvl(a.FRCST_sls,0)=0 then 0 else ROUND((a.FRCST_wage_amt / a.FRCST_sls)*100,2) end as FRCST_WGE_PCT_WPS from ww_wlp.mnth_fcst a,wk b,loc c,dept d where a.wk_id=b.wk_id and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) FRCST_wge_pct on lc.div_no=FRCST_wge_pct.div_no and lc.rgn_no=FRCST_wge_pct.rgn_no and lc.zone_no=FRCST_wge_pct.zone_no and lc.ar_no=FRCST_wge_pct.ar_no and lc.loc_no=FRCST_wge_pct.loc_no and lc.loc_nm=FRCST_wge_pct.loc_nm and lc.dept_no=FRCST_wge_pct.dept_no and lc.dply_seq=FRCST_wge_pct.dply_seq and lc.dept_nm=FRCST_wge_pct.dept_nm order by lc.div_no,lc.rgn_no,lc.zone_no,lc.ar_no,lc.loc_nm,lc.dply_seq) c,

a.div_no,b.rgn_no,b.zone_no,b.ar_no,a.loc_no,b.loc_nm,a.dept_no,c.dply_seq,c.dept_nm from loc_dept a,loc b, dept c where a.div_no=b.div_no and a.loc_no=b.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and between b.wk_strt and b.wk_end and b.fin_wk_no='FinWeek' and b.fin_yr='Year' and a.div_no=c.div_no and a.loc_no=c.loc_no and a.div_no='Division' and a.loc_no in (select loc_no from loc where div_no='Division' and wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq) c UNION select * from (select wlp_live_ind in ('Y','N') ) and a.div_no=d.div_no and a.dept_no=d.dept_no and d.dply_seq is not null and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) and (a.loc_no,a.dept_no,a.fcst_dte) NOT IN (select loc_no,dept_no,mgr_pln_sls_dte from (select c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,mgr_pln_sls_dte,ROUND(sum(a.mgr_pln_sls),0) as PLN_SLS_WPS from d.div_no='Division' and a.dept_no NOT IN (20,85) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,a.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte order by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,c.loc_nm,d.dply_seq,a.mgr_pln_sls_dte)) group by c.div_no,c.rgn_no,c.zone_no,c.ar_no,a.loc_no,c.loc_nm,d.dept_no,d.dply_seq,d.dept_nm order by
